title: De Koven, Weidmann, and Public Execution in France (Pt. 1)
itunes:title: De Koven, Weidmann, and Public Execution in France (Pt. 1)
description:
In July 1937, 22-year-old Jean De Koven vanished while visiting Paris with her aunt. It seemed doomed to be an unsolved missing person case, until an accidental connection revealed a series of murders, and a ring of criminals with Eugen Weidmann at the center. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In July 1937, 22-year-old Jean De Koven vanished while visiting Paris with her aunt. It seemed doomed to be an unsolved missing person case, until an accidental connection revealed a series of murders, and a ring of criminals with Eugen Weidmann at the center.

itunes:keywords: 20th century, murders, executions, guillotine, European history, France, crime, Eugene Weidmann, public executions, Jean De Koven
